title: EVs will outnumber diesel cars by 2030
lead: Number of petrol and diesel cars is predicted to see a drop of 16.6 million units by January 2030, new report suggests

title: SSEN procures 348MW of flexible energy service contracts
lead: That’s equivalent to the electricity needed to power around 91,000 homes

title: UK supports offshore wind deal in Taiwan with £200m
lead: East Anglia-based company Seajacks will ship the material needed to install the turbines and Trelleborg will provide protection systems for the cables which connect the turbines to the mainland

title: Pumped hydro energy storage tech can bring £690m in savings a year
lead: Long term pumped hydro with long term storage could unlock vast savings says new report

title: Do takeaways create tasteless emissions?
lead: Households that spend around £50 a week on takeaway, have a 450% higher annual carbon footprint than those who don’t, study finds

title: Vestas invests in wooden wind turbine tower startup
lead: Wooden alternatives to steel towers are claimed to cut emissions by 80%

title: Global spending in hydrogen projects to reach $300bn by 2030
lead: More than 200 large-scale projects are already in the pipeline, new report estimates

title: New partnership to promote sustainable finance in Brazil
lead: The Brazilian Federation of Banks and the International Finance Corporation will work together to support banks in implementing good climate risk management practices and training new businesses in making green investments

title: Marico Marine wins ADMIRALTY Energy Innovation Challenge
lead: Its solution will help to grow the offshore renewables sector by giving developers access to marine geospatial data that helps to identify the best locations for new energy infrastructure

title: Equinor and ENGIE team up to produce hydrogen from gas
lead: The project will be designed to capture carbon dioxide and store it permanently offshore
